attributes.action: work to ensure Haiti's existing debt is cancelled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Haiti owes $1bn to the International Monetary Fund, the Inter-American Development Bank, and others. 

How can Haiti possibly rebuild under this? How could Haiti ever pay off this debt? 

The UK Government needs to show respect to the Haitian people, and all those who have donated to the DEC appeal and other aid agencies and initiatives, by working with the IMF and other national governments (including the US) to cancel the debt.
